tool_description: Get country code by providing IP address (IPV4 & IPV6). We aim to provide output at lightning speed.

api_list.name: getCountryByIP
api_list.description: Retrieve the country code associated with a given IP address. Supports both IPV4 and IPV6 formats.

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description: The IP address for which the country code is to be retrieved.
